wikipedia_page.main: Danny George Taylor (born 1 September 1991) is an English footballer, who plays for Airbus UK Broughton.

response: Daniel, Dan, or Danny Taylor may refer to:
*Danny Taylor (ice hockey) (born 1986), British ice hockey goaltender
*Danny Taylor (rower), Irish Olympic rower and New Zealand university administrator
*Danny Taylor (Without a Trace), a fictional character on the CBS television crime drama

:A.  Soccerbase incorrectly states that Jon Taylor played for Shrewsbury Town in a match against Burton Albion on 16 January 2010. It was actually Danny Taylor who played in this match, whilst Jon Taylor was an unused substitute. Therefore, unless corrected, Jon Taylor always has one less football league appearance than what is stated on Soccerbase.
